title: Quadratic Equations Practice
description: Complete the quadratic equations worksheet covering standard form, factoring, and using the quadratic formula. Show all work for full credit.

title: Trigonometry Unit Test
description: Comprehensive test covering sine, cosine, tangent functions, unit circle, and trigonometric identities. Calculators are permitted.

title: Chemical Bonding Lab Report
description: Write a detailed lab report on the chemical bonding experiment conducted in class. Include hypothesis, methodology, results, and conclusions.

title: Renaissance Art Analysis
description: Choose three Renaissance artworks and write a 5-page analysis comparing their styles, techniques, and historical significance.

title: Shakespeare Sonnet Memorization
description: Memorize and recite one Shakespeare sonnet of your choice. Focus on proper pronunciation, rhythm, and emotional expression.

title: Newton's Laws Problem Set
description: Solve physics problems involving Newton's three laws of motion. Include force diagrams and show all calculations clearly.

title: Python Programming Project
description: Create a simple calculator program in Python that can perform basic arithmetic operations. Include user input validation and error handling.

title: Periodic Table Quiz
description: Online quiz covering element symbols, atomic numbers, and periodic trends. You have 45 minutes to complete 30 questions.

title: World War II Essay
description: Write a 3-page essay analyzing the causes and consequences of World War II. Use at least 5 credible sources and include proper citations.

title: Calculus Derivatives Homework
description: Complete exercises 1-25 from Chapter 3 on derivatives. Focus on power rule, product rule, quotient rule, and chain rule applications.
